item.title: The Monk Who Sold His Ferrari
item.description: Well let me start off by admitting a fact about me. I am not a reader. Over the years, I have lost the patience of sitting through a book. So after I heard about audible, I decided to try it out. Itâ€™s a fantastic app where you get one credit every month. You could use this credit to purchase any book of any price. In short, you can listen to twelve books for free in a year !
